header.title: JempBox - XMP Compatible Java Library
header.meta: Java XMP Library, XMP Java, XMP, PDF metadata

section.title: How to commit changes
section.p: Before committing a patch to Jempbox please make sure that if you build the project using the build.xml ant-script there are no compilation problems using a JDK 1.4 target and passing the checkstyle- and junit-tests. Additionally please add a action-item to the current release in the status.xml (in the folder website) that characterises the changes that you made.
